recipesJson.name: Blew blood
recipesJson.author: winder73
recipesJson.description:
I'm sure its been done in some form or another but whatever. This is nice blueberry inhale accentuated by the Lemon Sicily. Surprised and happy with the density, I expected it to be thinner. The exhale is sweet, minty and cool. 
I gave it a quick bath and some alone time...delicious
